CodeList.Name: Social Risk Factor

Description.TranslatedText: Terminology relevant to the social factors such as personal behavior, lifestyle, or environment belonging to the subject which are known to increase the likelihood of infection and disease.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An individual that came into contact with a source of Tuberculosis.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Subject in Contact With Tuberculosis Source

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: CURRENT OR RECENT EMPLOYEE OR VOLUNTEER IN HOMELESS SHELTER
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An individual who is presently or not long ago worked or offered to assist without pay at a temporary housing facility for persons without a stable or permanent residence.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Current or Recent Employee or Volunteer in Homeless Shelter

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: CURRENT OR RECENT EMPLOYEE OR VOLUNTEER IN JAIL OR PRISON
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An individual who is presently or not long ago worked or offered to assist without pay at an institution where persons are confined for punishment and to protect the public.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Current or Recent Employee or Volunteer in Jail or Prison

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: CURRENT OR RECENT EMPLOYEE OR VOLUNTEER IN NURSING HOME
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An individual who is presently or not long ago worked or offered to assist without pay at a residential health care facility for persons with chronic illness or disability.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Current or Recent Employee or Volunteer in Nursing Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An individual without a stable or permanent residence within the last 365 days.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: IMMIGRANT FROM HIGH TUBERCULOSIS PREVALENT AREA
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An individual that has migrated from a country with a high occurrence of tuberculosis.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Immigrant From High Tuberculosis Prevalent Area

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The state of being confined to jail or prison.
An individual that resided in a camp for those displaced from their homeland.

An individual that lives at a healthcare facility that provides rehabilitative, restorative, and/or ongoing skilled nursing care to patients or residents in need of assistance with activities of daily living.
An individual who moves from one location to another location within or outside of their homeland for work.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: REFUGEE FROM HIGH TUBERCULOSIS PREVALENT AREA
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: An individual that has fled a country for their own safety which has a high occurrence of tuberculosis.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Refugee From High Tuberculosis Prevalent Area

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Entry into one or more of the 22 countries that have a relatively high prevalence of tuberculosis cases.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Travel To High Burden Tuberculosis Country

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: The state of not having a job.

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Social Risk Factor Terminology
